idea-plugin.name: GetX
idea-plugin.description:
GetX_template
1. Used to generate the template code of GetX framework
2. Yo yo, Che Ke, get it done!

User Guide: Right-click the File: New -> GetX
idea-plugin.change-notes:
GetX_template Plugin Version1.0
1. You can generate a large number of GetX template codes
2. Improve development efficiency
3. If you have any questions, please give feedback
